content: add a handmade touch to your holiday gifting with this **noel mini gift bag crochet pattern** this quick and easy crochet christmas drawstring bag pattern is perfect for holding small gifts candies coins jewelry or party favors the reusable crochet holiday gift pouch is easy to make eco friendly and works up fast making it ideal for stocking stuffers craft fairs or gift giving all year round crochet in festive christmas colors or customize for birthdays weddings or special occasions to create charming small handmade pouches everyone will love jolly mini gift bag crochet pattern christmas drawstring bag / crochet holiday gift pouch **pattern attributes ** - the pattern is simple detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level easy to intermediate - finished measurements h= 5 ½ / w= 4 ½ - yarn type #2 light-weight yarn - crochet hooks 3mm - the pattern includes a step-by-step detailed written instructions and a photo tutorial
